RNS Number : 5919VAberdeen Standard Asia Focus PLC14 December 2021

Aberdeen Standard Asia Focus PLC (the "Company")

Legal Entity Identifier (LEI): 5493000FBZP1J92OQY70

Total Voting Rights Following Conversion of Convertible Unsecured Loan Stock ("CULS")

14 December 2021

The Company announces that following today's commencement in trading in 935 new Ordinary shares arising from the recent conversion of £13,764 units of CULS, the Company's issued Ordinary share capital now consists of 31,390,619 Ordinary shares and 10,348,918 Treasury shares and there are £36,643,991 units of CULS outstanding.

The above figure (31,390,619) may be used by Ordinary shareholders as the denominator for the calculations by which they will determine if they are required to notify their interest in, or a change to their interest in the Company, under the Disclosure Guidance and Transparency Rules.

Enquiries:

Charles Mearns

Aberdeen Asset Management PLC
